initialiseDB :: IO Connection Source #

Initialises the SQLite DB and creates table Games and Teams if not exists

Saves games

queryAllGames :: Connection -> String -> IO [Game] Source #

Gets all the games

queryAllTeams :: Connection -> IO [Team] Source #

Gets all the teams

querySelectedGames :: Connection -> String -> IO [SpecificGame] Source #

Fetches fullname and name for teams whose matches id of home teams in games
